title: cmd/gc: function that never returns not detected with for loop with always-true loop condition
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://play.golang.org/p/rE4sAgWDJZ

What is the expected output?

program should compile

What do you see instead?

a missed opportunity for detecting a function that never returns.

prog.go:7: missing return at end of function

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version' or 'gccgo --version')

tip

Please provide any additional information below.

writing this kind of loop is useful when you want to do something forever, but want to
count the number of iterations.
